name: Unified Football Data Pipeline
description: A pipeline that reads from Pub/Sub, processes football data from GCS, and writes to a unified BigQuery table.

parameters.name: input_files
parameters.label: Input file paths
parameters.helpText: Secrialized List of GCS file paths containing football data. ['gs://bucket/{api_name}/season_{season}/league_{league_id}/{endpoint}/{run_id}_{timestamp}.json', ...]

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for successful records (e.g., project:dataset.table).

parameters.name: schema_path
parameters.label: Path to Unified Schema file
parameters.helpText: The path to the JSON schema file.
